choices: Nothing happens. He has to wait longer.
1.content:
Durring Steven's new adventure he's taking a break and hes going to meet up with everyone to catch up. Steven wants to be the first one there because you want to set up food for everyone. Once everything is set up Steven stands back and places down the name cards for everyone's seats. As Steven places the last card he stands back next to his car and observes it to make sure its all perfect. When suddenly he shrinks to half an inch tall (1/2") and now he has to hope someone finds him and can (or will) help him when they arrive.

When suddenly....
1.title: At the meeting spot...

info.brief_description: This takes place after the end of Steven Universe Future.
info.description:
After the end of the epilog series 'Steven Universe Future' Steven drove off to find his next adventure. One day when Steven was taking a break and going to meet up with everyone to catch up when suddenly he shrunk to half an inch (1/2") tall at the meeting spot where everyone is going to meet up. What happens next?

RULES:
*No death.
*No ending the story.
*Always leave extra choice(s).
*No Scat or Fart stuff at all.
*No male interaction (other than Steven)
*No other tiniesother than Steven.
*Sex stuff is allowed.
